website_summaries.verdict: Papo’s dinosaur toys are impressive, but their huge spinosaurus clearly towers over the competition with its impressive details and intimidating design.
cons: A fairly pricy, yet awesome dinosaur toy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality toy but outdated model - Spinosaurus has shorter back legs
customer_reviews.text: My six year old says: The skin has realistic details. Mom says: very well made - it’s the best quality dinosaur toy I’ve seen and we have a ton HOWEVER newest research says this model is incorrect. Spinosaurus has shorter back legs. I’m still confirming that but if you have a stickler for reality like I do you might want to research further.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Eads

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item more suited as a model than a toy
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted with exquisite detail. I think would work excellent as a model. However, if you are buying this as a toy for a 4 year old, as I did, I would think twice. Within 3 days of having it one of the arms broke off at the elbow. My son slept with this thing and it never left his side for 72 hours, including in the shower, so who knows how he did it. Superglued it on fine and he continues to play with it (albeit lighter use than before), but since the arms and legs are separate pieces at the elbow and knees that are glued together, I'm not sure its built to be a toddler's toy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schmoe

customer_reviews.title: Second time’s the charm!! Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: After first time purchase with a broken toe and returned, it was clear the first time around was a repackaged product. This second time arrived bubble protected! And a manufacturer tag still attached! (First time didn't have a tag). Excellent product! Excellent service!! Loving this return process for reaching Customer expectations! Son loves it!! Detail is spot on!! Love papo dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.author: yrb230032

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, Museum-Quality Figure
customer_reviews.text: Papo is unrivaled when it comes to the sculpt and paint job on their dinosaur figures. This is a heavy, well-built figure that is a perfect addition to any dinosaur collection. THIS IS NOT A TOY, EVEN THOUGH IT IS LISTED AS SUCH. Other reviewers have complained that the arms pop off in play - this figure is better suited as a model and belongs on display, so skip this if you are looking for a gift for a young child. However, as a collector, I can say it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great detail but leans over
customer_reviews.text: The Papo Spinosaurus has the very impressive detail and aggressive posture of Papo's other dinosaurs such as the Allosaurus and Running Tyrannosaurus---and it's relatively large. It is apparently inspired by the Spinosaurus that appeared in JURASSIC PARK III. However, it's posture is the model's main problem. In hot weather, because the model is front-heavy, the soft toes give way causing it to lean forward and over. My Spinosaurus leaned over until its left arm/claw was resting on the surface. This problem can be solved by heating its toes with a hair dryer and bending the toes back into place. Overall, Papo's Spinosaurus is another fine dinosaur model, but one that may need a little periodic maintenance with a hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Der

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Figure, Easily my Favorite Dino Figurine
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous. I cannot put in words how happy I was when I saw this the minute I took its package inside. Totally worth every cent. Easily my favorite Papo figure. It's pretty anatomically correct (nostrils on top of the snout, longer index claw) as well, so immediate, obvious plus. Would I recommend this as a toy to be knocked around and beat on? No, this toy doesn't seem fit for rough playing, though light playing is okay, just be careful. Do I recommend this is as a collector's figure? A hundred times yes, it is probably the best Spinosaurus figure on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Gillybean

customer_reviews.title: Arm broke after two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Arm broke within the first two weeks. Not the quality I mot certainly paid for. My son didn't mind, he pretends the dinosaur lost it in battle. I do mind though. I wasn't going to leave a review, but he still talks about the loss - so here I am.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: In the last 15 years I bought a huge collection of Papo and Schleich's try figures to my son. Nowadays, most of them are on my office's desk and shelves for the amusement of many. Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.author: Hiker

customer_reviews.title: awesome-a-saurus.
customer_reviews.text: I just want to take this opportunity to thank Amazon for amazing customer service. When the first spinosaurus came it was unfortunately broken. My son saw this and lost it. He was anticipating this Dino coming for a couple of days. I called amazon and told them the situation. They immediately sent a new one that came perfect. It's cold where I live right now and I think the cold had something to do with the dinosaurs breaking. Otherwise it is a beautiful figure, made very realistically. I will order again from amazon an from this Papo line thanks to the customer service experience I had.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Anne

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: This Spinosaurus is incredibly lifelike! It has realistic skin texture and muscle definition. It balances well and is a hefty size. It might be too delicate for very young kids, but is beautiful as a collector item. Incredible purchase
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a few other Papo Dinosaurs for a friend, and this one in particular made his day when it arrived, compared to Slyke (or however its spelled) spino, the difference is immense, the detail of this beast is wonderful and in my opinion, though I am no professional, accurate. (I don't care who gets mad at this but it sizes up well to the T-Rex, and its neck fits great in the mouth, perfect for how that crap fight in Jurassic park 3 should have went)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Should Buy This.
customer_reviews.text: If you ever were into Dinosaurs in anyway this is a must purchase. Too nice to be played with this Spinosaurus is a great edition to any shelf and or room. It's based on the Spinosaurus from Jurassic Park 3 and boy did they do an amazing job on it. It looks great with its mouth open or closed as every inch of this thing was detailed beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: The seller delivered as stated. It was packaged well. The toy also was well made; it has a moveable mouth. My grandson, who had his sixth birthday, was very excited to receive it. It is a great toy for interaction and creativity. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: J. Evans

customer_reviews.title: The detail on it is amazing. I especially liked how the sail has a ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this Spinosaurus for my son for his 4th birthday as he had been asking for one for some time. He loves it. The detail on it is amazing. I especially liked how the sail has a slight rainbow on it when you look at it in certain light!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Valadez

customer_reviews.title: A spinosaur for the ages
customer_reviews.text: This is the TRUE spinosaur for my generation. Do not subscribe to that flat-tailed giant salamander model that scientists are trying to foist on us today. Jurassic Park 3 lives on in the hearts of many, and this toy continues that bold tradition.
customer_reviews.author: harry osborn

customer_reviews.title: Great detail. My 11 year old son is quite impressed & happy w purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My son is very particular about the quality if his realistic animals and he was absolutely impressed with this one. It took us 2 days to locate "the right" look of the Spinosaurus he desired. He decided on this one, crossing his fingers that it would look realistic and be the right size in comparison to his current collection. This met and exceeded his expectations. The detail of the eyes are really great. The size seems larger than the measurements online.
customer_reviews.author: Time is precious

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it but......
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dino - just the right size, very realistic, the mouth opens and closes. However, right out of the box my son made it "eat" his T-Rex and the mouth is now open forever. Not gaping, but it doesn't close all the way anymore. What are you going to do? It's a toy and kids are tough on toys. It's still a favorite toy and gets played with every day. I would recommend it to kids who want a really good Spinosaurus Egypticus.
customer_reviews.author: Collette M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Spinosaurus
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality, very detailed dinosaurs that are as good if not better than the other big name animal and dinosaur figurines. Excellent reproduction of the real Spinosaurus. I compared this one to a photo I took of a real one and it's amazingly similar.
customer_reviews.author: C.R

customer_reviews.title: Great gift to a child who loves Dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a 6 year old boy who is in love with dinosaurs and who knows absolutely everything to know about dinosaurs. When he received the gift, he inspected it all over and gave it his approval telling his mom, this is really good quality mom! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Josette McAdams

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has the best deal on these, and they are great quality. My son has had several different Papo dinosaurs that he plays rough with, and other than a little wear and missing paint, they stand up strong and have provided many hours of play. My son loves dinosaurs and I find that these more expensive dinos are worth the added cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Raynor

customer_reviews.title: Close to museum quality
customer_reviews.text: The model is made from very realistic "heavy" non-plastic material. The coloration is also very realistic. The model easily stands on its two feet as it would in real life. The facial detail is superb, and the lower jaw moves. This model is a major step above the normal dinosaur toys. This is close to museum quality.
customer_reviews.author: an old fan

customer_reviews.title: Great work of art
customer_reviews.text: Based on the Jurassic Park spinosaurus. Just a wonderful piece, like most of the Papo line. If you can afford it, it's a great addition to your collection. This one is big, solid, and about the same size as the running T-Rex (it should actually be a little bigger than a T-Rex). Mouth moves. Good paint details.
customer_reviews.author: Reed J. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love her!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely her! She is my favorite papo dinosaur and is exactually as advertised. She is a solid model and very durable, but took a long time to get here. It was totally worth it. I highly reccommend this amazing model!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Birthday gift.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved this Spinosaurus for his 4th birthday. But after a little while the poor spinosaurus's right arm popped off. But other than that, this toy was very detailed. The jaw moves and I would have kept it for myself if I didn't love my punk of a nephew more. :D
customer_reviews.author: KilljoyKim

customer_reviews.title: we love them.
customer_reviews.text: Exact replica of the Spino in JP3 even with the detail of the green exes, and the exact size scale to match the T-rex of the same collection. My 6 yr old and I, we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar V, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: My son is crazy about Dinosaurs and after the mighty T-Rex the Spinosaurus was on his list! His mouth dropped open with excitement and even his older brother was wow'd. The shipment was quick and wonderful...I will buy again, just waiting for the next one he picks...Thank you for a wonderful gift for my future paleontologist...
customer_reviews.author: Leola Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard plastic, and an arm broke off after a few dino fights.
customer_reviews.author: hzinda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy!
customer_reviews.text: This figure is absolutely amazing! Its so realistic and just such a beautiful toy. Its mouth opens and closes so smooth. This was so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: The best Dino figures out there!
customer_reviews.text: Been collecting the PAPO Dino line over the last few months and I've been blown away by the quality every time. The Spinosaurus was the first one I purchased and she is beautiful. Looks great displayed on a shelf and rugged enough to survive everything my 3 year old has tried to put it through. Will continue to purchase more of these figures.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Holley

customer_reviews.title: I love the detail and everything BUT highly disappointed that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the detail and everything BUT highly disappointed that it came with a broken arm right out the box.
customer_reviews.author: JoseF123

customer_reviews.title: Loved the detail and how menacing it looked
customer_reviews.text: This is a heckuva a dinosaur! Loved the detail and how menacing it looked! My 5 year old son brought it into the bathtub with him right away and recreated the Jurassic Park III scene (which i still have my problems with since I am a Trex lover).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Spinosaur model!
customer_reviews.text: This, along with its cousin the t-rex, are among the best dino model I have seen. The only thing I wish they did was to make it a bit bigger. The current size next to the t-rex is still smaller than what was shown in Jurassic Park movie. If there was a way they can make the model's head and nick posable then it will come close to be ultimate model.
customer_reviews.author: QuetiFifiDad

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaurs rule the roost
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6 year old. He absolutely loves it. Great durability and design. Will last much longer then he will play with it. I am making shelves to display them on, they look that good. I also have the T-Rex and will buy the Indominus Rex if and when they produce it.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett M. Spence

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Item For A Young Dinosaur Enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old nephew and was surprised at the quality and the detail in the toy. While it only has one articulating piece (the mouth) the whole thing is very well made. It's fairly heavy and all the smallest details are accounted for. The rough, cracked skin, the roof of the mouth, the claws and the facial features are all captured perfectly. My nephew loves posing it in his room and now has a new favorite dinosaur.
customer_reviews.author: Mervin Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Model but...
customer_reviews.text: This spinosaurs model was truly amazing, in size, detail, and color. My only problem with this model was that it had black stripes on only one side of its snout. A day later the feet gave out and it kept leaning on its left hand. I tried to fix it with "hot water trick" but it fell again the next day. This happened continuously for a week straight. I might just get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Jaws Open and Close
customer_reviews.text: My son loves all his dinosaurs, but this one is special. He likes to "pose" them in fights sometimes and this Spinosaurus opens and closes his mouth which makes it more fun for him. Dinosaur is well made and looks exactly as pictured. Great for all Dinosaur lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: My grandson's favorite dinosaur, but the arm has broken twice as ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's favorite dinosaur, but the arm has broken twice as well as one of the toes. For a six year old who lets his dinosaurs fight, I would expect this to not be an issue, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: review

customer_reviews.title: Great sculpt but lacks color.
customer_reviews.text: Papo has done an amazing job on the sculpting once again! But, I'm afraid it lacks in the paint departments. All though it obviously resembles the Spinosaurus from Jurassic Park /// it does not have the same paint job instead going for a dull boring grey. I will have to customize mine.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellently Intense
customer_reviews.text: This is outstanding. Fantastic quality, nice construction, and great overall satisfaction upon seeing. I seriously don't know what else to say. 10/10 would buy again and again. My sister is going to love this model / action figure.
customer_reviews.author: kbrooks311

customer_reviews.title: We did break an arm off pretty quickly, but I got it for a 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed. We did break an arm off pretty quickly, but I got it for a 4 year old, so not unexpected. Overall nice item.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great Model
customer_reviews.text: My favorite dinosaur by far is the Spinosaurus, ever since seeing it in Jurassic Park 3 I loved it and have researched it quite a bit. This a great model, it is highly detailed and looks fantastic, unlike the vast majority of cheap fake looking dinosaur models which are primarily meant for kids. I keep this one on display with my Spinosaurus tooth and they look fantastic together.
customer_reviews.author: Blake W Kilcoyne

customer_reviews.title: Just like JP3 Spinosaurus
customer_reviews.text: Great dinosaur figure. More detailed then the pictures depict. Mine is precisely 6 3/8 inches to the top of his spine. 6.5 inches to the top of his snout. 11 inches from tip of his tail to top of his neck. Then 3 inches to the tip of his snout making him/her 14 inches in length. Weighs 12.8 ounces. Surprised he/she is 1.85 ounces lighter then the T-Rex. Was able to measure with my calipers and the Spinosaurus was leaner widthwise by 3/8 inch in the torso from the T_Rex. Might explain the weight difference. Was going to give to one of my great nephews but decided to keep it myself. Will look for something less expensive. :)
customer_reviews.author: Stilllearning

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: I am greatful for this toy because I am collecting them to have my dinosaours again and thanks for make it possible but amazon please sell all the toys and product because sometimes it is not easy to get this products in Mexico. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Papo Spinosaurus...
customer_reviews.text: Here we have Papo's Spinosaurus. There is not much to tell that hasn't already been said. He is a sweet little figure. The coloring is a bit blander than the production photos, but the pose is menacing. You also get the impression that there really is muscle there, with a tightly-stretched reptile skin wrapped over it all. A solid recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Imperator

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFULLY CRAFTED!
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic. The skin looks so real that I find it a little spooky, but my 10 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sonrisa Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent detail and seems sturdy for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who is passionate about dinosaurs. Excellent detail and seems sturdy for the most part. The mouth, which opens and closes, seems fairly sturdy but I do not imagine it would stand up to rough play. Still, all in all a good buy. The kiddo loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: 👍👌
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid, collecting dinosaurs was my thing. I had the t Rex, but never had a Spinosaurus. Now I do. It's going to look good on my work desk 😉.
customer_reviews.author: Aztec Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Dinosaur- 4yr Old Dino-Loving Son Adores It!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased several Papo figures, and have been pleased with each and every one. This dinosaur was no exception. The Spinosaurus is very detailed, is made of quality heavy material, and stands well on both hard and carpeted floors (important so little dino lovers are not frustrated). Our son's favorite thing about this dinosaur is the hinged jaw, so he can make his Spinosarus "eat" his other dinos. Wonderful toy, well worth every penny, thank you Papo for making such beautiful figures that can withstand hours of play!
customer_reviews.author: SBrenz

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this Spino
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Spino! Looks incredible and lifelike -- especially when compared to the Schleich one. Very, very nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: so cool
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best replica dinos on the market, and for a reasonable price. I use these for teaching. I would not let my students play with them. But if your kids are dino fanatics, and they can be gentle with them, they will enjoy Papo dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: Papo makes another fantastic model
customer_reviews.text: Though Jurassic park 3 and it's depiction of Spinosaurs are both horrendous, Stan Winston Studios certainly created a visually stunning creature on screen that fit in with the pantheon of Jurassic Park dinosaurs. This Papo model captures that aesthetic perfectly. Another imposing figure with impressive detail makes a wonderful addition to both dinosaur enthusiasts and Film buffs alike.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Bolz

customer_reviews.title: The attention to detail is great and they open their jaws so you can see ...
customer_reviews.text: Other than the size, these dinosaur toys are very realistic. The attention to detail is great and they open their jaws so you can see the carnivores' teeth up close. My 4-year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Pelican

customer_reviews.title: Nicely detail model
customer_reviews.text: Another of Papo's first rate models. Looks great staged with Papos' walking T-Rex model (the dino fight club scene from Jurassic Park 3). I would say it's a collectable and not a toy for children to use for entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Papo Dinosaurs are the best!
customer_reviews.text: The detail is incredible... I mean the muscularity and vascularity of these dinosaurs are great! I have the T-Rex as well, the detail is just superb, all other dinosaurs figures I have seen when compared to these made by Papos are just toys.
customer_reviews.author: Completely sane!

customer_reviews.title: the arm broke and my son does not play rough ...
customer_reviews.text: the arm broke and my son does not play rough.
customer_reviews.author: stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it! big fan of Jurassic Park
customer_reviews.text: Came in fast. Looks great! I love the Jurassic Park movies. Looks just like the one from Jurassic Park 3. I will be ordering more like this.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I've spent a small fortune buying my nephew dinosaur toys but this is one of the best, if not the best. The look and colors are fantastic. The mouth articulates to different openings. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely detailed, well above "toy status ". More like a period representative model.
customer_reviews.author: richard e burk

customer_reviews.title: His limbs are glued on!?
customer_reviews.text: After I got it, it lasted a month or two and then one limb fell off and then the next and the next and now he only has his left back leg remaining. I think it was O.K. because it lasted a long time. He is still able to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Roepod

customer_reviews.title: These are so real looking! My grandson was hugging ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so real looking! My grandson was hugging the toy and even slept with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Booth

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectation
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson is a dinosaur fanatic! When he received this dinosaur in the mail my daughter had me facetime with him while he opened it. He was SO excited and I was shocked (in a good way) as to how big it was. The details are so realistic as well. The added bonus for my grandson is when he discovered the jaw moved up and down! Hands down that I would recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the kiddies, they just love dinosaurs! It's pretty well made and very detailed.
customer_reviews.author: John Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality toy
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality toy! My son loves it. Realistic looking and sturdy. His jaw moves open and closed as well. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Model
customer_reviews.text: Like the Allosaurus, I enjoyed this model of the Spinosaurus as well. It is very life like and highly detailed. Again another must have for dino enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Raskule

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice dinosaur replica of Spinosaurus! My son absolutely loves him! And I'm. Wet impressed with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander A. White

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality
customer_reviews.text: The papo Spinosaurus has beautiful quality and it's huge! It's jaw can move up and down. I'm so happy with it, if you want a great dinosaur to add to your collection I would definetly recommend purchasing this Spinosaurus! 5 out of 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: but i do like how the mouth opens and closes
customer_reviews.text: the point on the tail was as sharp as a point on a knife, it cut my son on his face. also a toe broke off when it fell 2 feet onto a wood floor. but i do like how the mouth opens and closes, also a very realistic look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: rob cusack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and uses it for models for drawings
customer_reviews.author: Neil H. Nitkin

customer_reviews.title: Remarkably well done!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprisingly super detailed and almost professionally sculpted!BEAUTIFUL!Seems more like a model/statue than a child's toy!Great for collectors and children alike!
customer_reviews.author: William R. Grillaud

customer_reviews.title: Great detail and color
customer_reviews.text: This product is being used as a graphics model. The movable jaw is very well made. The details and coloration is great. If this is being used as a toy, it seems to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: PP6592

customer_reviews.title: Striking excellent attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: Striking detail, Papo has the best quality I have purchased dozens of Papo figurines, they surpass other makes in every respect This one has a jaw which opens and shuts -- movement is smooth and the hinge is almost seamless
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: It can not get any more real! My grandson loves the detail on Spinosaurus face. It is made of hard, durable plastic. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: JB Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than T-Rex
customer_reviews.text: Who knew there was a meat eating dino bigger than T-Rex? My son. You shold have seen his face light up when this box arrived. The quality is amazing and the detail is not what you'd expect in a toy. The jaw works so well, I don't worry about it getting broken and think this is a 2010 toy that might get handed down a generation from now.
customer_reviews.author: Red One

customer_reviews.title: not so tough
customer_reviews.text: Awesome detail and fast shipping. But did not survive attack by German Shepard, I thought dinosaurs were tough
customer_reviews.author: bradb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter totally loved this figurine. She was so happy when I gave it to her. Very well made and realistic
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Corsbie

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dinosaur. It is very well done and the lower jaw moves with a very sturdy joint mechanism. Realistic and my grandson was thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Spinosaurus!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my grandson's favorite dinosaur of all of them. He will love receiving this one for his 5th birthday this coming Sunday!!! Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: ludatgst

customer_reviews.title: Great Spinosaurus
customer_reviews.text: Our little 3 year old grandson fell in love with this dinosaur! Very well made, sturdy and with excellent detail. Great find for the price....thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Patty

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wanted for Christmas present, and it arrived broken. That is sad (((
customer_reviews.author: Andranik

customer_reviews.title: Greatly detailed.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! So detailed and realistically scaled. Made so well and the material used is very good, hard, and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: MAPAHaus

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality toy that is a good size as well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality toy that is a good size as well. The lower jaw hinges open and closed making it all the more cool!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ann Smith-Coleman

customer_reviews.title: they were very gracious and easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: well, this guy is one of my grandson's very favorites only the toes keep breaking off. I bought 21 different dino's for him for Christmas, 18 of which were of this quality (average $20 apiece) and this is the only one that has had issues. I contacted Amazon and they have sent me 2 more, one of which a toe has already broken off. I appreciate Amazon's efforts to please me, as always, they were very gracious and easy to work with. My grandson loves this guy but the quality is not the same as all the others.
customer_reviews.author: janie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is very well made with amazing detail. Dinosaur enthusiasts will definitely appreciate this one. Don't hesitate to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia B.

customer_reviews.title: Spinosaurus Rules!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool dinosaur, my 3 year old son loves playing with all of his Papo dinos. Would highly recommend this dino for a display piece or for a kids toy!
customer_reviews.author: CDG

customer_reviews.title: Spinosaurus by Papo
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy having purchased this one. The amount of detail ,colour and size of the model are all amazing. I feel I should call it a model more than a toy due to the overall quality of it.From a modelers perspective I could easily put it on a base; creating a diorama with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hano

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Model
customer_reviews.text: This spinosaurus model is cool, realistic and detailed and it's bigger than I thought. And I like how it's mouth opens and closes and I like the detail in its mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very Lifelike!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Spinosaurus! Moving jaw, quite large. Very heavy and durable. Claws are sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great one to get for the dinosaur lover, my daughter loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This item is such a great quality. I really really like it! The color is pretty awesome and the jaw/mouth looks pretty real!
customer_reviews.author: MomOfBoys

customer_reviews.title: Wrong toy twice
customer_reviews.text: I order the dinosaur listed, was shipped entirely something else. I thought this was a one time error and since my grandaughter loves Dino I ordered it again. But again they shipped an entirely different Dino. I was chafed and paid $45.00 for these errors. I contacted the appropriate people to be told via email. Sorry that's not our department , job. To help with these problems. Contact someone else.... NO. I will not order from this site again or any other Papo toy.
customer_reviews.author: Dfoto

customer_reviews.title: Great Dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic ( as far as your imagination will take you since it's unknown what this creature actually looked like) dinosaur. The moveable jaws are very convincing looking and the dino stands on it's own without falling over.
customer_reviews.author: MJG

customer_reviews.title: For kids who love Dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Dinosaur toy for boys who love collecting them - most boys would probably fall into this category. The detail on this toy is the best that I've seen on a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Scraggletag

customer_reviews.title: Weak arms.  Broken on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing looking but it arrived with a broken arm despite very well padded packaging.
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome figures, much more than toy quality
customer_reviews.text: The person who got these for Christmas was blown away. These are awesome
customer_reviews.author: L.P

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite dinosaur!
customer_reviews.text: My son's favorite dinosaur!! It's the best quality I've ever seen, very very real looking, and is super durable. This brand of dinosaurs is the only brand I'll buy now.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Muis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and the feel of this toy but it broke the 2nd day.
customer_reviews.author: Tara P.

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for adults
customer_reviews.text: Cool action figure but not for kids which is exactly who I brought it for! I will say it's durable, since buying there's a broken arm (thats taped on) a broken claw and toe missing but the thing still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf Salaam

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!
customer_reviews.text: Awsome!! Great detail!! Love it!!! Needs a dead guy in its mouth though!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 12 and has always loved dinosaurs. These are very realistic and loves having his friends around him.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was very happy with this, big size, nice detail
customer_reviews.author: mark littrell

product_meta.title: Papo The Dinosaur Figure, Spinosaurus
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Spinosaurus or "spiny lizard" is one of the longest known dinosaurs measuring up to 18 m in length, 6 m in height and weighing up to 9 tonnes. It is recognizable for its large back spines, which lead us to suppose that it had a sail used as a temperature regulator. The Spinosaurus, which lived in the Cretaceous period, was both a carnivore and a fish eater. Both long and narrow, and equipped with numerous straight teeth, the Spinosaurus skull is a similar shape to that of crocodiles.
feature_bullets: ONE OF THE LONGEST DINOSAURS - The Spinosaurus or "spiny lizard" is one of the longest known dinosaurs measuring up to 18 m in length, 6 m in height and weighing up to 9 tonnes. It is recognisable for its large back spines, which lead us to suppose that it had a sail used as a temperature regulator.

EXPERIENCE THE JURASSIC WORLD - Get an experience with this realistic gray green color, has an articulated jaw and with a skull that is similar shape to the crocodiles. This Spinosaurus figure is perfect to mix and match with other Papo dinosaurs.

DEVELOPS DEXTERITY AND SPARKS THE IMAGINATION - We encourage your kids to use their imagination to create their own magical kingdom. This Papo toy will help to develop their skills while enjoying hours of imaginative play in great planet's history.

GREAT DETAIL - It is hand painted with amazing detail, realistic, educational, and fun, this figurine is suitable for a range of interests, including collectors, teachers, and kids. Another special characteristic of this figure is the care in the details and postures, which gives the impression that the figurines are animated.

BEAUTIFULLY FINISHED AND DURABLE - This figure is beautifully finished and the extreme attention to detail is universally recognised. This figure is made of a very high quality plastic, its measures approximately 6.5 inches tall; Suitable for ages: 3+ Years.
